title: Are these teasers in the new skin splashes or am I just forgetting somethings?
body:
[](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/228029489538531329/501858653863804949/unknown.png)

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/228029489538531329/501858554198753280/40013.png

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/228029489538531329/501858606627684352/unknown.png

who's dis..

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/228029489538531329/501858653863804949/unknown.png

Well... hello there morg..

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/228029489538531329/501858703855845378/unknown.png

The top is obviously bewitching nid, and the bottom is trist, but who's the middle one? Deep sea nami? 

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/228029489538531329/501858760659173417/unknown.png

######wishful thinking this is a year in advanced teaser for a halloween Elise skin.. riot pls {{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: ? Another anime picture that looks NOTHING alike. The guy in the splash looks like a generic goblin merchant or something.
The response image is goblin slayer. He has an obsession with killing goblins. The show is currently airing so you might be seeing him referenced quite a bit if goblins are involved.
Oh...well, okay. Without context, i had no way of knowing anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=vxY4Hz3k,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-10-17T16:39:26.637+0000)
>
> ? Another anime picture that looks NOTHING alike. The guy in the splash looks like a generic goblin merchant or something.

I wasn't posting because they look alike. The pic is from goblin slayer.
Yeah, i know that now but without context nobody could.

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=vxY4Hz3k,comment-id=0002000000010000,timestamp=2018-10-17T19:03:01.000+0000)
>
> Yeah, i know that now but without context nobody could.

I mean, anyone who is into anime got it.

No, anyone who watches the anime this guy is in would get it. I've seen a few animes and i don't know who this guy is at all, mostly because i am not into this type of stuff. It's all subjective as you don't know if everyone who saw that and is "into" anime instantly upvoted it.

> https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/228029489538531329/501858760659173417/unknown.png
>
> ######wishful thinking this is a year in advanced teaser for a halloween Elise skin.. riot pls {{sticker:sg-janna}}

Yes, please.

**Yes, please.**

The "middle" is a black cloud.
The goblin is probably flavor, like the children in Ekko's splash, unless you believe we'll be getting a group of children as a champion.
As for Morgana, her Bewitching skin already has pointed bat wings, so if they are closed, they would give us that silhouette.

So no, they're not teasers. I supposed the Morgana silhouette could be considered a teaser, but I don't think her profile is that different from her existing Bewitching skin. The only notable thing about it is that it's mostly hidden in obscurity, and her dress is blocked from view.

> group of children as a champion.

I could see it!

They could uh... sing as an ability that uh... makes people sleep ?
Surely must be a new champion, we haven't had a new one since Pyke! (No I am NOT gonna count reworks).
that could be bewitching nidalee not morgana.
